noun.description: A plant that thrives in sand or sandy soil. Later also: an animal that lives in sand, or in a sandy habitat.

adjective.description: Growing or living in sand or sandy soil; = psammophilous.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in Frederic A. Lees (1847–1921). From psammo- + -phile, perhaps after French psammophile, adjective.
